pages.text: $(o)"In the Moon's light, the Bastard Child flutters towards Nothingness, so as to never reach it again. Long lost is its first skin, in the Mirror of what is, and only the anguish of the Dragons may remember it, though the Gate bears its flesh."$()

pages.title: Symbol
pages.text: This symbol is created with an $(l:alchemy/entry_entropizing_catalyst)Entropizing Catalyst$() in the $(l:glory/entry_rite_glorious)Glorious Rite$().$(br)The symbol can be linked to an altar, and will supply the $(marked)Chaos$() aspect.
